XXekottaru:0: (EĀ.Trip 2.1) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam abhāvitam amṛdu bhavati akarmaṇyaṃ yathedaṃ cittam /
XXekottaru:1: cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ abhāvitam amṛdu bhavati akarmaṇyam /
XXekottaru:2: tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan naś cittam abhāvitam amṛdu bhaviṣyati akarmaṇyam evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam //
XXekottaru:3: (EĀ.Trip 2.2) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evaṃ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṃ yathedaṃ cittaṃ /
XXekottaru:4: cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyam /
XXekottaru:5: tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac cittaṃ naḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhaviṣyati karmaṇyam evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam //
XXekottaru:6: (EĀ.Tri 2.3) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṃ yathedaṃ cittam /
XXekottaru:7: cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṃ /
XXekottaru:8: tadyathā yāni kānicid dārujātāni syuḥ candanaṃ teṣām agram ākhyāyate mṛdutāyāṃ karmaṇyatāyāṃ
XXekottaru:9: evam eva nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṃ yathedaṃ cittam /
XXekottaru:10: cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyam /
XXekottaru:11: tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac cittaṃ naḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhaviṣyati karmaṇyam evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam // //
XXekottaru:12: (EĀ.Trip 3.11) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛtam abhāvitam āyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati yathedaṃ cittam /
XXekottaru:13: cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛtam abhāvitam āyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati
XXekottaru:14: tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan na naś cittam adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛtam abhāvitam āyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākaṃ bhaviṣyati evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ //
XXekottaru:15: (EĀ.Trip 3.12) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam sudāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāvitam āyatyāṃ sukhavipākaṃ bhavati yathedaṃ cittam /
XXekottaru:16: cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ sudāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāvitam āyatyāṃ sukhavipākaṃ bhavati /
XXekottaru:17: tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac cittaṃ naḥ sudāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāvitam āyatyāṃ sukhavipākaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ //
XXekottaru:18: (EĀ.Trip 3.13) yathā duḥkhavipākaṃ sukhavipākam eva anarthāya arthāya
XXekottaru:19: ahitāya hitāya duḥkhāya sukhāya vyasanāya saṃpade vipattaye saṃpattaye asamṛddhaye samṛddhaye apāripūraye pāripūraye pārihāṇāya apārihāṇāya // //

XXekottaru:21: cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛtam abhāvitaṃ saṃrāgāya saṃvartate /

XXekottaru:27: saṃmohāya asaṃmohāya saṃyogāya visaṃyogāya saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya ācayāya apacayāya upādānāya anupādānāya ucchedāya anucchedāya saṃśreṇanāya viśreṇanāya saṃdhūpanāya vidhūpanāya bāhulyāya saṃlekhāya saṃsargāya asaṃsargāya prapañcāya niṣprapañcāya ālayāya anālayāya avyupaśamāya vyupaśamāya // //
XXekottaru:28: (EĀ.Trip 4.11) tadyathā śāliśūko vā yavaśūko vā mithyāduṣpraṇihitaḥ syāt /
XXekottaru:29: taṃ śūkaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī padbhyām anvākrameta /
XXekottaru:30: sa tasya abhavyas tvacaṃ bhitvā rudhiram utpādayituṃ /
XXekottaru:33: (EĀ.Trip 4.12) evam eva sa bata mithyāduṣpraṇihitena cittena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣyati vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /

XXekottaru:625: (EĀ.Trip 26.11) parṣat kaṣāyaṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi parṣanmaṇḍaṃ ca tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye /
XXekottaru:627: yasyāṃ parṣadi adharmo dīpyate dharmaḥ pratyuhyate avinayo dīpyate vinayaḥ pratyuhyate adharme khalu dīpyamāne dharme pratyuhyamāne avinaye dīpyamāne vinaye pratyuhyamāne adharmavādinaḥ avinayavādinaḥ pudgalā balavanto bhavanti dharmavādino vinayavādinaḥ pudgalāḥ durbalā bhavanti adharmavādiṣu avinayavādiṣu pudgaleṣu balavatsu dharmavādino vinayavādinaḥ pudgalās tūṣṇīṃ vāsaṃ vasanti utthāya vā viprakrāmanti /
XXekottaru:630: yasyāṃ parṣadi dharmo dīpyate adharmaḥ pratyuhyate vinayo dīpyate avinayaḥ pratyuhyate dharme khalu dīpyamāne adharme pratyuhyamāne vinaye dīpyamāne avinaye pratyuhyamāne dharmavādino vinayavādinaḥ pudgalā balavanto bhavanti adharmavādina avinayavādinaḥ pudgalā durbalā bhavanti dharmavādiṣu vinayavādiṣu pudgaleṣu balavatsu adharmavādina avinayavādinaḥ pudgalāḥ pratyantān vā bhajante sarveṇa vā sarvaṃ na bhavanti /
XXekottaru:632: (EĀ.Trip 26.14) parṣatkaṣāyaṃ ca vo deśayiṣyāmi parṣanmaṇḍaṃ ceti me yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktam //
XXekottaru:633: (EĀ.Trip 26.21) anagravatīṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi agravatīṃ ca /
XXekottaru:634: tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye /
XXekottaru:636: yasyāṃ parṣadi navakā bhikṣavaḥ sthavireṣu bhikṣuṣu agauravā viharanty apratīśā abhayavaśavartinaḥ sthavirāś ca bhikṣavaḥ śaithilikā bhavanti bāhulikā avakramaṇīye pūrvaṃgamāḥ praviveke nikṣiptadhurāḥ śikṣāyāṃ mandagauravāḥ /
XXekottaru:639: yasyāṃ parṣadi navakā bhikṣavaḥ sthavireṣu bhikṣuṣu sagauravā viharanti sapratīśāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ sthavirāś ca bhikṣavaḥ na śaithilikā bhavanti abāhulikāḥ avakramaṇīye nikṣiptadhurāḥ praviveke pūrvaṃgamāḥ śikṣāyāṃ tīvragauravāḥ /
XXekottaru:641: (EĀ.Trip 26.24) anagravatīṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāṃi agravatīṃ ceti me yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktam //
XXekottaru:642: (EĀ.Trip 26.31) vyagrāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi samagrāṃ ca, tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye /
XXekottaru:644: yeyaṃ parṣat kalahajātā viharati bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhitā vivādamāpannā /
XXekottaru:647: yeyaṃ parṣat kalahajātā viharati na bhaṇḍanajātā na vigṛhitā na vivādamāpannā /
XXekottaru:649: (EĀ.Trip 26.34) vyagrāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi samagrāṃ ceti me yad
XXekottaru:651: (EĀ.Trip 26.41) uttānāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi gaṃbhīrāṃ ca, tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye /
XXekottaru:653: yeyaṃ parṣat uddhatā unnatā capalā mukharā pragalbhā gharṣitasmṛtir asamāhitā /// /
XXekottaru:656: yeyaṃ parṣad anuddhatā anunnatā acapalā amukharā apragalbhā upasthitasmṛtiḥ samāhitā /// /
XXekottaru:658: (EĀ.Trip 26.44) uttānāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi gaṃbhīrāṃ ceti me yad
XXekottaru:660: (EĀ.Trip 26.51) āmiṣagurukāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi dharmagurukāṃ ca,
XXekottaru:661: tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye /
XXekottaru:663: yathāpīhaikatyā āmiṣahetor anyonyaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti te āmiṣam evāntarākṛtvā anyonyaṃ takṣanti saṃtakṣanti saṃparitakṣanti apīdānīṃ kulāny uddāyādāni kurvanti iyam ucyate āmiṣagurukā parṣat /
XXekottaru:665: yathāpīhaikatyā dharmahetor anyonyaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti te dharmam evāntarākṛtvā nānyonyaṃ takṣanti saṃtakṣanti saṃparitakṣanti na ca kulāny uddāyādāni kurvanti iyam ucyate dharmagurukā parṣat /
XXekottaru:666: (EĀ.Trip 26.54) amiṣagurukāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi dharmagurukāṃ
XXekottaru:667: ceti me yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktam //
XXekottaru:668: (EĀ.Trip 26.61) viṣamāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi samāṃ ca, tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye /
XXekottaru:672: sa svasyāḥ parṣadaḥ purastāt svaṃ vādam abhūtenātatvenānarthopasaṃhitenācaṣṭe prajñapayati prasthāpayati vibhajati vivṛṇoty uttanīkaroti deśayati
XXekottaru:674: paravādānāṃ randhrāṇi cchidrāṇi śavalāni kalmāṣāṇy abhūtenātatvenānarthopasaṃhitenācaṣṭe prajñapayati prasthāpayati vibhajati vivṛṇoty uttanīkaroti deśayati saṃprakāśayaty anusandhim api bhāṣate iyam ucyate viṣamā parṣat /
XXekottaru:678: sa svasyāḥ parṣadaḥ purastāt svaṃ vādam bhūtena tatvenārthopasaṃhitenācaṣṭe prajñapayati prasthāpayati vibhajati vivṛṇoty uttanīkaroti deśayati saṃprakāśayaty anusandhim api bhāṣate /
XXekottaru:679: paravādānāṃ randhrāṇi cchidrāṇi śavalāni kalmāṣāṇi bhūtena tatvenārthopasaṃhitenācaṣṭe prajñapayati prasthāpayati vibhajati vivṛṇoty uttanīkaroti deśayati saṃprakāśayaty anusandhim api bhāṣate iyam ucyate samā parṣat /
XXekottaru:680: (EĀ.Trip 26.64) viṣamāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi samāṃ ceti me yad
XXekottaru:682: (EĀ.Trip 26.71) anāryāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi āryāṃ ca, tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye /
XXekottaru:684: yeyaṃ parṣad idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāty ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ
XXekottaru:685: duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti /
XXekottaru:688: yeyaṃ parṣad idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXekottaru:690: (EĀ.Trip 26.74) anāryāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi āryāṃ ceti me yad
XXekottaru:693: (EĀ.Trip 26.9) antaroddānaṃ dharmo vinaya āpattir gurukā sāvaśeṣā ācīrṇā abhāṣitā apraṇihitā aprajñaptā asamavahatā //
XXekottaru:697: (EĀ.Trip 28.0) uddānaṃ saptaviṃśad dharmebhir nava jñānena kārayet /
XXekottaru:698: dṛṣṭiḥ saṃvṛtir ārakṣā kiṃpuruṣaḥ poṣadhena ca //
XXekottaru:700: (EĀ.Trip 28.01) evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavāṃ cchrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme
XXekottaru:702: (EĀ.Trip 28.1A) dvau dharmau nāma ca rūpaṃ ca /
XXekottaru:724: saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvegaḥ tathāsaṃvignasya ca yoniśaḥ pradhānaṃ /
XXekottaru:725: asaṃtuṣṭiḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu aprativāṇiś ca prahāṇe /
XXekottaru:729: dvau dharmau nāma rūpaṃ ca avidyā dvitīyaṃ padaṃ /
XXekottaru:730: bhavadṛṣṭiś cāhrīkyaṃ hrīś cāpi durvacatvaṃ ca //
XXekottaru:734: saṃvegaś cāpy asaṃtuṣṭiḥ śamatho vidya jānatā //
XXekottaru:745: (EĀ.Trip 28.3) dve hetū dvau pratyayau samyagdṛṣṭer utpādāya /
XXekottaru:746: parataś ca ghoṣa adhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manasikāraḥ //
XXekottaru:749: (EĀ.Trip 28.5) dvayor dharmayos tīvraś cetasaḥ ārakṣāsmṛtyapramāde yogaḥ
XXekottaru:751: (EĀ.Trip 28.61) dvāv arthavaśau saṃpaśyan kiṃpuruṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣīṃ vācaṃ na bhāṣate /
XXekottaru:752: mā ca mṛṣāvādaṃ kariṣyāmi mā ca pareṣām asatāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyam utpādayiṣyāmi /
XXekottaru:753: (EĀ.Trip 28.62) etāv eva dvāv arthavaśau saṃpaśyan satpuruṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣīṃ vācaṃ na bhāṣate
XXekottaru:754: mā ca mṛṣāvādaṃ kariṣyāmi mā ca pareṣām asatāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyam utpādayiṣyāmi /
XXekottaru:759: + + + 1 Blatt fehlt (EĀ.Trip 28.Y) dvau piṇḍakau samasamau vipākato yaṃ ca piṇḍakaṃ paribhujya bodhisatvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho yaṃ ca piṇḍakaṃ paribhujya tathāgato nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaś ca //
XXekottaru:761: bhikṣur evaṃ samyagāyācamāna āyāced aho batāham evaṃrūpaḥ syāṃ tadyathā śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣū /
XXekottaru:763: eṣā hi bhikṣavas tulā etat pramāṇaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ yaduta śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣū /
XXekottaru:765: bhikṣuṇī evaṃ samyagāyācamāna āyāced aho batāham evaṃrūpā syāṃ tadyathā mahāprajāpatī gautamī utpalavarṇā vā bhikṣuṇī /
XXekottaru:767: eṣā hi bhikṣavas tulā etat pramāṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ yaduta mahāprajāpatī gautamī utpalavarṇā vā bhikṣuṇī /
XXekottaru:769: upāsaka evaṃ samyagāyācamāna āyāced aho batāham evaṃrūpaḥ syāṃ tadyathā anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ śrāvastyāṃ hastako vā ālavakaḥ kauśāmbyāṃ /
XXekottaru:771: eṣā hi bhikṣavas tulā etat pramāṇaṃ upāsakānāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ yaduta anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ śrāvastyāṃ hastako vā ālavakaḥ kauśāmbyāṃ /
XXekottaru:773: upāsikā evaṃ samyagāyācamāna āyāced aho batāham evaṃrūpaḥ syāṃ tadyathā viśākā mṛgāramātā śrāvastyāṃ kubjottarā vā kauśāmbyāṃ /
XXekottaru:775: eṣā hi bhikṣavas tulā etat pramāṇaṃ upāsikānāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ yaduta viśākā mṛgāramātā śrāvastyāṃ kubjottarā vā kauśāmbyāṃ // //
XXekottaru:794: saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvegaḥ tathāsaṃvignasya ca yoniśaḥ pradhānaṃ /
XXekottaru:795: asaṃtuṣṭiḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu aprativāṇiś ca prahāṇe /
XXekottaru:807: (EĀ.Trip 29.3) dvau hetū dvau pratyayau śaikṣasya samyagdṛṣṭer utpādāya /
XXekottaru:808: parataś ca ghoṣa adhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manasikāraḥ //
XXekottaru:811: (EĀ.Trip 29.5) dvayor dharmayoḥ śaikṣeṇa tīvraś cetasaḥ ārakṣāsmṛtyapramāde yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
XXekottaru:814: upasthitasmṛtitā ca kāye notkṣiptacakṣuṣkatā ca antargṛhe /
XXekottaru:821: yathā lābha alābha evaṃ yaśa ayaśo nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ //
XXekottaru:826: yathā lobha evaṃ dveṣo mohaḥ pūrvavad yathā likhitaṃ /
XXekottaru:829: (EĀ.Trip 29.102) yathā prajñāpratilaṃbhāya evaṃ pūrvavad yathoktaḥ prajñāmārgaḥ // //
XXekottaru:833: (EĀ.Trip 30.11) dvau dharmau loka utpadyete bahujanāhitāya bahujanaduḥkhāya anarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ yaduta adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:834: adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca loka utpadyete bahujanāhitāya bahujanaduḥkhāya anarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ /
XXekottaru:835: (EĀ.Trip 30.12) dvau dharmau loka utpadyete bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya
XXekottaru:836: arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ yaduta dharmacaryā samacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:837: dharmacaryā samacaryā ca loka utpadyete bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ //
XXekottaru:838: (EĀ.Trip 30.21) ye kecid anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ saṃbhavanti sarve te adharmacaryāviṣamacaryāmūlakā adharmacaryāviṣamacaryāsamudayā adharmacaryāviṣamacaryājātīyā adharmacaryāviṣamacaryāprabhavāḥ adharmacaryāviṣamacaryāmūlakā hi ye kecid anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ saṃbhavanti /
XXekottaru:839: (EĀ.Trip 30.22) ye kecid anekavidhāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ saṃbhavanti sarve te dharmacaryāsamacaryāmūlakādharmacaryāsamacaryāsamudayādharmacaryāsamacaryājātīyādharmacaryāsamacaryāprabhavāḥ
XXekottaru:840: / dharmacaryāsamacaryāmūlakā hi bhikṣavo ye kecid anekavidhāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ saṃbhavanti //
XXekottaru:841: (EĀ.Trip 30.301) dvau dharmāv anarthāya saṃvartete adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:842: dvau dharmāv arthāya saṃvartete dharmacaryā samacaryā ca
XXekottaru:843: yathā anarthāya arthāya evam ahitāya hitāya duḥkhāya sukhāya vyasanāya saṃpade vipattaye saṃpattaye asamṛddhaye samṛddhaye apāripūraye pāripūraye pārihāṇāya apārihāṇāya ||Hs. parihāṇāya|| dṛṣṭadhārmikasyārthasyānarthāya dṛṣṭadhārmikasyārthasyārthāya sāmparāyikasyārthasyānarthāya
XXekottaru:845: (EĀ.Trip 30.41) dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ
XXekottaru:847: adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ utpadyante /
XXekottaru:848: (EĀ.Trip 30.42) dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā
XXekottaru:850: dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā notpadyante /
XXekottaru:851: (EĀ.Trip 30.43) dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyām anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ notpadyante
XXekottaru:853: adharmacaryayā viṣamacaryayā ca anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ notpadyante /

XXekottaru:861: notpadyante utpannāś ca prahīyante yaduta dharmacaryayā samacaryayā ca /

XXekottaru:870: (EĀ.Trip 32.201) dvau dharmau saṃrāgāya saṃvartete adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:872: dvau dharmāv asaṃrāgāya saṃvartete dharmacaryā samacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:875: yathā saṃrāgāya asaṃrāgāya saṃvartete evaṃ sadveṣāya asadveṣāya saṃmohāya asaṃmohāya saṃyogāya visaṃyogāya saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya ācayāya apacayāya upādānāya anupādānāya ucchedāya anucchedāya saṃśreṇanāya viśreṇanāya saṃdhūpanāya vidhūpanāya bāhulyāya saṃlekhāya saṃsargāya asaṃsargāya prapañcāya niṣprapañcāya ālayāya anālayāya avyupaśamāya vyupaśamāya saṃvartete /
XXekottaru:877: (EĀ.Trip 32.301) dvau dharmau virāgaṇāya saṃvartete ete eva adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:879: dvau dharmāv ārāgaṇāya saṃvartete dharmacaryā samacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:880: dharmacaryā ca samacaryā ca ārāgaṇāya saṃvartete /
XXekottaru:882: yathā virāgaṇāyārāgaṇāya evaṃ saṃtoṣāya asaṃtoṣāya andhakaraṇāya anandhakaraṇāya acakṣuṣkaraṇāya cakṣuṣkaraṇāya ajñānakaraṇāya jñānakaraṇāya prajñādaurbalyāya prajñāvṛddhaye vighātapakṣāya avighātapakṣāya nābhijñāya abhijñāya na saṃbodhaye saṃbodhaye + + + /
XXekottaru:884: (EĀ.Trip 32.401) dvau dharmau duścaritāya saṃvartete adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:886: dvau dharmau sucaritāya saṃvartete dharmacaryā samacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:889: yathā duścaritāya sucaritāya evam akuśalāya kuśalāya sāvadyāya niravadyāya + + ... + + ya sopavādāya anupavādāya sopaghātāya anupaghātāya sānutāpyāya
XXekottaru:890: anutāpyāya sānubhāṣikāya ananubhāṣikāya + + ... + + pratilomikāya anulomikāya ananucchavikāya anucchavikāya anaupayikāya aupayikāya
XXekottaru:892: (EĀ.Trip 32.501) dvau dharmau hīnāya saṃvartete adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā
XXekottaru:895: dvau dharmau praṇītāya saṃvartete dharmacaryā samacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:898: yathā hīnāya praṇītāya evaṃ kṛṣṇāya śuklāya + + ... + + ya ūrdhvaṃbhāgagamanīyāya mithyādṛṣṭaye samyagdṛṣṭaye mithyāpratipattaye samyakpraipattaye mithyāpraṇidhānāya samyakpraṇidhānāya + + ... + + vipade saṃpade duṣprajñāya prajñāsaṃpade muṣitasmṛtitāyai upasthitasmṛtitāyai
XXekottaru:900: anabhisamayāya abhisamayāya anālokāya ālokāya avipaśyanāya vipaśyanāya //
XXekottaru:901: (EĀ.Trip 32.601) dvau dharmāv asatpuruṣasaṃsevāyai saṃvartete adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:903: dvau dharmau satpuruṣasaṃsevāyai saṃvartete dharmacaryā samacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:906: yathā asatpuruṣasaṃsevāyai satpuruṣasaṃsevāyai evam asaddharmaśravaṇāya saddharmaśravaṇāya
XXekottaru:907: + + ... + + pāpamitratāyai kalyāṇamitratāyai pāpasahāyatāyai kalyāṇasahāyatāyai pāpasaṃparkatāyai kalyāṇsaṃparkatāyai +
XXekottaru:908: + ... + +anapatrāpitāyai apatrāpitāyai pramādāya apramādāya vivādāya avivādāya saṃghabhedāya saṃghasāmagryai // //
XXekottaru:909: (EĀ.Trip 32.701) dvau dharmau buddhe agauravāya saṃvartete adharmacaryā
XXekottaru:911: adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca buddhe agauravāya saṃvartete
XXekottaru:912: / dvau dharmau buddhe gauravāya saṃvartete dharmacaryā samacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:913: dharmacaryā samacaryā ca buddhe gauravāya saṃvartete /
XXekottaru:915: yathā agauravāya gauravāya evam apratiśatāyai supratiśatāyai /
XXekottaru:916: yathā buddhe evaṃ dharme saṃghe śikṣāyāṃ anuśāsane apramāde pratisaṃstare samādhau // //
XXekottaru:917: (EĀ.Trip 32.801) dvau dharmau na mātṛjñatāyai saṃvartete adharmacaryā
XXekottaru:920: dvau dharmau mātṛjñatāyai saṃvartete dharmacaryā samacaryā ca /
XXekottaru:923: yathā na mātṛjñatāyai mātṛjñātāyai evam na pitṛjñatāyai pitṛjñatāyai na śrāmaṇyāya śrāmaṇyāya na brāhmaṇyāya brāhmaṇyāya na kule jyeṣṭhapacāyitāyai kule jyeṣṭhapacāyitāyai mahecchatāyai alpecchatāyai + +
XXekottaru:924: ... + + tāyai durbharatāyai subharatāyai lābhī bhavati mahecchatāyai lābhī bhavati alpecchatāyai asaṃtuṣṭo viharati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ /
XXekottaru:927: dve caturdaśike jñeye daśa paṃcadaśaiva ca /
XXekottaru:930: (EĀ.Trip 33.101) dve dāne āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānaṃ ca dvau yogau dvau tyāgau
XXekottaru:931: dvau saṃgrahau dvāv anugrahau dvau saṃstarau dvau pratisaṃstarau dvau bhogau dvau saṃbhogau dvau bhāgau dvau saṃvibhāgau dvau nicayau dvau saṃnicayau dvau nidhī dvau saṃnidhī dve bale dvau pugau dvau rāśī dvau puṃjau dvau kośau dvau koṣṭhāgārau dvāv abhiṣekau dvāv abhiṣyandau dve saṃpade dve saṃpattī /// dve bhaktī /
XXekottaru:934: (EĀ.Trip 33.21) annaṃ pānaṃ khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ vastraṃ śayyāsanāni ca /
XXekottaru:937: yad dharmadānam adadat tathāgato hy anuttaraḥ sarvabhūtānukaṃpī /
XXekottaru:938: taṃ tāyinaṃ devamanuṣyaśāsakaṃ santo namasyanti bhavasya pāragaṃ // //
XXekottaru:942: (EĀ.Trip 33.32) yathā dve dāne evaṃ yāvad dve bhaktī amiṣabhaktir dharmabhaktiś ca //
XXekottaru:948: gāḍhā gurukā sāvaśeṣā ca praticchannā ca uttānā āviṣkṛtā deśitā pratikṛtā ca saṃvarakaraṇīyena kṛtvā vargo bhavati samudditaḥ //
XXekottaru:950: yaś cātyayam atyayato na jānāti yaś cātyayam atyayato jñātvā na yathādharmaṃ pratikaroti //
XXekottaru:952: yaś cātyayam atyayato jānāti yaś cātyayam atyayato jñātvā yathādharmaṃ pratikaroti //
XXekottaru:954: dvau na saṃkliśyete dvayor āśravā na vardhante //
XXekottaru:966: kauśalyena dvayaṃ kuryāt pariśuddhyāpi ca dvayaṃ /
XXekottaru:967: alajjinā dvayaṃ kṛtvā vargo bhavati samudditaḥ //
XXekottaru:977: anāpannasya ca anāpattikauśalyam āpannasya ca āpattivyutthānakauśalyaṃ ca // //
